properties.entry: INSERT INTO COMPANY ( COMPANY_NO , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_PWD , COMPANY_HEAD , COMPANY_COMMENT , COMPANY_ENROLL , COMPANY_STATUS , COMPANY_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('A',7) , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' , ? )
SELECT COMPANY_NO , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_PWD , COMPANY_ENROLL FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COMPANY_NO DESC
